document_info.title: Calcium Hydroxide Instead of Lye - Forum Discussion
document_info.purpose: Discussion of calcium hydroxide as safer alternative to sodium hydroxide (lye)
document_info.disclaimer: Educational reference only. Documents historical extraction chemistry discussions.

original_question.question: Would I be able to use Calcium Hydroxide instead of NaOH?
original_question.reason: Have bunch already, would rather not work with lye

key_points.best_use: Calcium hydroxide is BEST for STB tek designed specifically for it
key_points.solubility_issue: Poorly soluble in water - doesn't work well in A/B teks (will work, just not well)
key_points.stb_ratio: Need about 50:50 calcium hydroxide to powdered bark
key_points.water_amount: Just enough water to make it WET
procedure: Add just enough water to wet
Let sit few hours, mixing occasionally

dmt_freebase_ph.overkill: Anything pH 12+ is overkill for DMT

chemistry_explanation.why_people_use_naoh: Helps break down plant fibers better - has NOTHING to do with DMT

mimosa_vs_others.mimosa: Harder to extract - NaOH helps degrade plant matter, making extraction more efficient
mimosa_vs_others.chacruna_chaliponga: Higher pH makes things WORSE - soap forms from fats, causing emulsions

questions_raised: How well does calcium hydroxide dissolve in water?
What pH does it take to?
endlessness_moderator.recommendation: If using calcium hydroxide, make A/B instead of STB - increases chances of working

on_koh.safety: KOH flakes relatively safe to handle even with bare hands
on_koh.warning: Don't try this with NaOH - lye eats tissue

biopsylo_contributions.sodium_carbonate_success: Had quite good success with A/B using only sodium carbonate as base
biopsylo_contributions.sodium_carbonate_preparation: Bake sodium bicarbonate in oven 2 hrs @ 400F in clean baking dish

experiment.method: Wet lime STB at high temperature
experiment.ratio: 1 part Ca(OH)2 : 1 part MHRB powder : 10 parts water
experiment.result: PURE WHITE DMT without any yellow oil after freeze prep

tryptographer_experiment.safety_note: Calcium hydroxide is strong base - don't let it touch eyes or skin. But doesn't dissolve tissue like lye.
tryptographer_experiment.endorsement: Calcium hydroxide is one of the most useful substances to the psychonaut!

suggestions: Maybe freeze-thaw cycles to break down mimosa without NaOH?
Could perform cactus non-toxic tek with mimosa and lime 1:1
Use naphtha instead of limonene (limo leaves residue if evaporated)
Freeze precip instead of salting with vinegar

cons: Doesn't work well in traditional A/B
calcium_hydroxide.key_technique: Keep mixture WET, use minimal water

sodium_carbonate.preparation: Bake baking soda at 400F for 2 hours

ph_requirements.overkill: pH 12+ unnecessary for chemistry, but helps with plant breakdown

plant_material_differences.mimosa: Hard fibers - benefits from strong base to break down
plant_material_differences.chacruna: High fat content - high pH causes emulsion-forming soap
plant_material_differences.chaliponga: Similar to chacruna - avoid very high pH

calcium_hydroxide_tek_design.key_principle: Due to low water solubility, must be used as PASTE not solution
calcium_hydroxide_tek_design.contact_time: Let sit hours, keep wet, mix occasionally

practical_applications.for_beginners: Calcium hydroxide is safer starting point than lye

ratio_guidance.other_references: Some sources say 25g lime per 100g MHRB
